title: Diamond Square R4W Foam Glue Up 20x20 Decorative Ceiling Tiles (21.12 s/f) Pack of 8 PCS
features: Goes over popcorn and most ceiling surfaces (make sure the surface is stable and smooth)
Adds insulation. Very light weight (~ 1 oz)
Easy to install, easy to cut with utility knife, no expansive tools needed
Can be painted with water-based paint
description: The Royal Collection ceiling tiles are made out of extruded polystyrene (a type of styrofoam). That material makes them even, thin and offers a smooth surface, with great natural-looking and nicely textured designs. It also allows the tiles to be cleaned easily and be water-resistant. Helps the customer to be creative by giving the tiles the finish he or she desires, with help of a roller, sprayer, or regular paintbrush and a bucket of water-based paint.
